name: Evilplumbing
body:
# Evil.Plumbing
A landing page for a conference talks, or an excuse to buy a cool domain.

### Media
The presentation deck will be available for download here, after it has been presented at [AtlSecCon](http://atlseccon.com).

### Schedule
* AtlSecCon - Halifax - April 7 at 2:00pm
* Thotcon - Chicago - May 5 or 6
* Northsec - Montreal - May 19 or 20

### Resources and Links
Links to all materials referenced in the talk will be added here.


### Authors and Contributors
Guillaume Ross - [@gepeto42](https://twitter.com/gepeto42)

Jordan Rogers - [@joeynoname](https://twitter.com/joeynoname)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
